about.details:
Incorporated in 1995, Shree Ganesh Remedies Ltd is Ankleshwar, Gujarat based engaged in manufacturing and dispatch of drug intermediates and chemicals like amine hydrochloride and specialty fine chemicals for pharmaceutical industry. Company manufacture products relating to antipsychotic, antiseptic, deprotonation reactions, hyperlipidemia, alzheimers and anti-viral.

The Products are manufactured for export market and also for domestic and foreign markets. Company’s manufacturing facility is divided into three manufacturing plants namely Plant I, II and III spread across 9715 Square meters having different product manufacturing capabilities and process.

contactDetails.full_address: Shree Ganesh Remedies Ltd, Plot no. 6011 G.I.D.C, Ankleshwar - 393002

faqs.question: What is the Shree Ganesh Remedies IPO?
faqs.answer:
Shree Ganesh Remedies IPO is a SME IPO of 2376000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹8.55 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹36 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on September 28, 2017, and closes on October 5, 2017.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Shree Ganesh Remedies IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Shree Ganesh Remedies IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Shree Ganesh Remedies IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Shree Ganesh Remedies IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Shree Ganesh Remedies IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Shree Ganesh Remedies IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Shree Ganesh Remedies IPO opens on September 28, 2017 and closes on October 5, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Shree Ganesh Remedies IPO?
faqs.answer: Shree Ganesh Remedies IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,08,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Shree Ganesh Remedies IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Shree Ganesh Remedies IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Shree Ganesh Remedies IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Shree Ganesh Remedies IPO will be done on Tuesday, October 10, 2017, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, October 12, 2017. Check the Shree Ganesh Remedies IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Shree Ganesh Remedies IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Shree Ganesh Remedies IPO listing date is on Friday, October 13, 2017.
